Find Balance

Stance gives you the power to visualize your financial well-being...
Who wouldnt want that?

See how

How much do you know about your financial health? Like actually.

Did you know 99% of americans are underexposed to details about their current financial standing which in turn puts them at a 44% greater risk for late retirement.

Another stat Quiz me

Live Within Means

Often with other products people are unable to accurately gauge their current financial position which leads to poor financial choices.

Stance helps you avoid that.

Build for the Future

Many times it’s hard to know who the future you is… more or less setting that person up for success. Don’t you wish you could see how the future you will pan out?

Stance shows you that.

Meet Obligations

Everyone has their necessities whether it be a student loan or taxes. No one really likes them, but if you don’t get it done you might be worse off than when you started.

Stance keeps you in check.
